titleStmt.title: Diverse sermons with a short treatise befitting these present times, now first published by Thomas Iackson, Dr in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majestie, and president of Corpus Christi Colledge in Oxford. ...
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.

titleStmt.title: Diverse sermons with a short treatise befitting these present times, now first published by Thomas Iackson, Dr in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majestie, and president of Corpus Christi Colledge in Oxford. ...
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [par.]⁴ A-2E⁴ (-[par.]1).

"Three sermons preached before the King, vpon Ier. 26. 19" and "A treatise concerning the signes of the time" each has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous. "A sermon or postill preached in Newe-Castle vpon Tine the second Sunday in Advent 1630" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
